website_summaries.verdict: Extremely inexpensive electric leaf blower that will handle smaller jobs nicely.
pros: Weighs only 3.9 pounds, so you can carry it and use it one-handed easily
Has a maximum air speed of 155 miles per hour
Works nicely for cleaning sidewalks and driveways
cons: Maximum air flow is only 260 cu

customer_reviews.title: Legit leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value at $16. Did exactly what I needed it to do. Cleaned out mulch around trees. Also took care of leaves in rock piles around house. This also works great to clean ride-on lawn mower. I had some wet leaves at the bottom of a pile that it took care of as well. If you keep in mind you're working with a $16 leaf blower and you're not a landscaper, you won't be disappointed at all! Leaf blower is light weight and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Craig G.

customer_reviews.title: What! How much. Can't believe the price
customer_reviews.text: Yes its electric and you will need to drag an extension cord around, however you won't need to buy gas and oil or perform the regular maintenance usually required for gas powered lawn tools. Keep in mind this is not a high powered, noisy, commercial tool and you will be completely satisfied. I've spent twice as much on a case of beer - it didn't help get the yard work done though. This blower is fully capable of light duty and quiet jobs - you could use it inside your home (not advisable). Sun Joe tools are value priced, quality tools that I have yet to be disappointed with. For the price, what have you to lose?
customer_reviews.author: Mr. MomTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great value and saves time / effort cleaning house
customer_reviews.text: Great value for a pretty powerful leaf blower. This is my first leaf blower, so I dont have a point of comparison, but im impressed so far. The tasks i use it for: Inside the house - pushing out dust balls from under beds and sofa and hard to reach areas which i then vacuum later (be careful, this really unearths alot of dust and dirt, so beware for allergy sake and you might want to wear goggles) Garage - cleaning the garage floor vs. broom (i have a really large garage) Patio - saves effort and time vs broom Car: drying car after wash As you can see, im pretty lazy, and this serves me pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value. Blows leaves away as good as my gas powered. But without gas or the noise.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little leaf blower I bought my Mother because of its light weight and ease of use. It's a electrical blower so not as nearly powerful as gas, but its also under $20 and weights under 5lbs. And doesn't raise the dead with all the noise of a gas powered blower. My Mom for the last 50yrs sweeps off our porch and part of the driveway at least, sometimes twice a day. This little blower is just what she needed and she loves it. Like I said very light, and not loud.
customer_reviews.author: Grave Dancer

customer_reviews.title: This blower is unbelievable absolutely works great by it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have other blowers that were 5060 bucks I even had a motor blower. I know it sounds too good to be true . trust me it works fantastic when any of my other blowers go bad I will be buying these cheaper blowers to do the big job . I’m already going to buy another one for my RV and my shop...... I will leave a review in six months.
customer_reviews.author: Brad S.

customer_reviews.title: VERY IMPRESSED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a car detailer I was tired of drying by hand. This leaf blower took off 90% of the water! I'm totally impressed! So powerful and small fits perfect in my 5 gallon bucket for transporting my cleaning supplies I wish I would have got this earlier! Only $17 what a steal! Little loud but that's expected. Car detailer's get this you won't be disappointed!! Thanks Mr Hedypoo
customer_reviews.author: Mr Hedypoo

customer_reviews.title: Light, cheap, decently strong
customer_reviews.text: At this price point I had pretty low expectations. I don't know how they can make money on this. It is great for light work to clear patios etc. The blow power is a little too light for major messes or clearing more than 6" high debris. It can still be accomplished with some extra work and passes. But, I would upgrade to a stronger model for heavier jobs. That said, this is a great deal for light jobs. it is very light weight and pretty strong in a narrow blow area.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This little guy kicks ass.  Won't peel paint off the wall, but it's all that it won't do
customer_reviews.text: About 1/3rd the size of a non commercial duty yard leaf blower ...but I bought this for my small patio and blowing out vents and between seats and floor mats in my trucks and home computers and window sills, etc. Only one high speed but you'll be finished so fast you'll look for other dust and twigs that needs disturbing. Nozzle is two pieces, and the 110 plug is just a short pigtail. Keep an eye on it...I can see this little troublemaker getting swiped if you leave it unattended.
customer_reviews.author: Boss of  dos gattos

customer_reviews.title: Great for clearing leaves, pine straw, pine cones, small rocks from concrete
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily for clearing leaves and pine straw from my porch, sidewalk, and concrete driveway and this little guy makes quick work of it. Even on areas of packed down gravel it can clear wet leaves easily. I have used it for clearing the leaves off the lawn and can see where a more powerful or even gas-powered blower would be better suited. The nozzle is a bit too small for it to be effective at blowing leaves which are tangled in the grass. Overall though, I would recommend this for clearing flat surfaces like wooden porches and paved sidewalks/driveways. Great little leaf blower that's very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Jake W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, use, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I only needed this leaf blower for my small back yard, garage, small front porch. I didn't need anything fancy...just an inexpensive light weight one for dust, plant debris on pavers/garage. It's exactly what I needed. It comes in a small box. I easily attached or snapped the 2 black pieces in front of the motor. You have to connect it to your own extension cord w plug. It doesn't come with a plug. I no longer have to sweep so much!
customer_reviews.author: ggaa

customer_reviews.title: Good light duty blower.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, as indicated.... not all that powerful but does fine for me moving debris/pine needles off the deck and driveway. Moves small 3/4 in pebbles on the driveway if that is any indicator. Does what I need.
customer_reviews.author: TBigATC

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This leaf blower works great! It is lightweight and powerful. It blows all the leaves off my porch, deck, and surrounding areas. There is a hook on the back to secure the extension cord to keep it from coming unplugged. It cake in a box that was small, it snaps together easily, in under one minute. I would definitely recommend it and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Southern Sassy Mama

customer_reviews.title: This thing blows !!!
customer_reviews.text: Like not in a bad way ... like it does its job ... pretty simple ... plug it in and turn it on ... start blowing .... blow everything ... blow your neighbor's like my wife does ... but thats another story ... all in all this is a great value !!
customer_reviews.author: derek black

customer_reviews.title: Great value for leaf cleanup!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect too much given the low price on this item, but wanted a leaf blower to help deal with the never-ending supply of leaves in my front yard/driveway. I purchased a long extension cord (100 foot) and was pleasantly surprised at how well it worked - even with somewhat wet leaves or fairly big piles in places, it had enough power to really help. I hate how loud and heavy gas ones are, and this one was easy to manuever around. The only slight problem I had was it seems to come unplugged fairly easily between the extension cord and the unit. But overall happy!
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Good machine so far.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once but it fully met my expectations. It's light weight, easy to use and has as much power as I had hoped. I have not used it nor do I plan to for any heavy work, just blowing the trash out of my rock bed and off my porch or out of my garage. Note that it is not cordless. A plug in model is what I wanted because I don't want to have to worry whether the battery happens to be charged when I want to use it and all the places I expect to use it have ready access to an outdoor outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota papa

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We live in a mobile home, and there is no plant matter such as leaves we need to get rid of; however, we live in the desert and during storms, much dust and other debris is blown and ends up under our awning on our patio and driveway. This little item was a perfect price for what will be occasional usage. I have had others in the past, much heavier and bulky, for larger jobs. If you just want something for small jobs, get this item. Takes little space storing, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene B

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and strong when it's close to debris
customer_reviews.text: It's really not that big and smaller than most other blowers. but it's lightweight and has pretty strong concentrated wind. It's just not a large wind opening but it's strong enough to blow small rocks and debris if you are not too far away. I think for the money it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: ScottyTreehouse

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. The blower is small and lightweight, but packs a punch. I have a deck that gets covered with pine needles, this blower does a great job of clearing them away. I'm also going to use it as a "blow drier" for my motorcycle after washing it. 100% satisfied. It's a quality product and I absolutely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Seward

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: My front entry way seems to collect every leaf and pine needle on the block.... but this little powerhouse takes care of that! Lightweight, nice size, and just what I needed. The only trick was finding the right extension cord since the plug on the unit is recessed. But once that was taken care of, no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Serves it’s purpose perfectly! Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Okay... I’m honestly super impressed. I’m very happy with this purchase. I only need the blower to clean off my sidewalks and porches and it serves its purpose flawlessly. Idk about pushing leaves but the price is UNBEATABLE. So if you’re looking to do minor landscape/yard work, give this a try. Crazy how cheap it is - can’t believe it’s as high quality as it is! HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sam S.

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: My headline is a bit over the top lol! Although I wish I got this little thing last summer when I started having to cut grass. I was sweeping up extra grass after I was done. I got fed up of that and looked for a blower. This thing cleared away my patio in no time. Yes the cord is annoying but I think I paid about $18 for this thing, which is amazing and certain beats trying to sweep all your grass up.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: I'm 61, female, walk with a cane, and am recovering from a broken ankle
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical. But since it's arrival I have enjoyed using it to blow cobwebs from the patio furniture, dirt and leaves from the garage, eaves, windows and patio. Looks kinda funny, me limping around, blowing the garage out, with my cane in my other hand. Oh and I'm a ambidextrous user, switching cane and blower with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L E It

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight AND powerful
customer_reviews.text: I was intimidated to get a leaf blower since they seem heavy and cumbersome. This one showed a woman “easily” using it, but that was from the actual company. I decided to get it based on the price and reviews and I’m glad I did. It’s really lightweight yet powerful and easy to put together and use. I have a gravel only yard and a giant tree that sheds all of its leaves. I needed something powerful enough to move the carpet of leaves but not too powerful to also blast away the decorative gravel. This was perfect. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: J. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Sun Joe product (I currently own the Pressure Washer and the driveway attchment for the pressure washer) and i am very satisfied with all of their products thus far. This one, specifically, is super lightweight and does all it is supposed to do, which is BLOW! Without all the unneccesary wind or power, it blows clippings & leaves very easily. Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: TenaB

customer_reviews.title: This is the best $16 I've spent on Amazon in years!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best $16 I've spent on Amazon in years! I camp host for several months and hate sweeping around the site with a push broom. This does the job much better in one tenth of the time! Compact and stores easily in the RV. I also use it to get debris off the RV awning and other camp items. Almost as powerful as the heavy duty blower I use at home. Definitely and excellent value for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Bananas Foster

customer_reviews.title: Was a steal at $20!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in box showing what you the item was..a small box at that!! (Shout out to my delivery driver that hid this behind my brick porch wall!!!!) Item was very easy to put together and worked just fine with my "yard" extension cord. Extremely nice power output for something so very cheap!! I'm beyond thrilled to have taken the chance buying this item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rogue

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how excited I was after using this. It is very powerful, easy to use, and really works well. My only issue was that the piece that goes on in front, kept falling off, but that seems to have corrected it self. Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Lol

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Blower
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to remove the leaves from my third floor balcony that backs onto a wooded area. Keeping up with leaves falling daily in the fall was a chore. This gets the job done in minutes. I purchased due to the compact size and the reputation of Sun Joe company. Amazon had the lowest price of anywhere I checked. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DeppGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Nice for small space like car port and decks. You can not use more the a 50 drop cord so if getting it for the yard this may not be for you. It works perfectly for what I needed. This was an A++ buy for me. For $18 it get 2 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new first floor condo and every Tuesday lawn maintenance blows away any leftover debris from their work. Unfortunately they end up blowing some into my enclosed patio. Rather than chasing after them I purchased this to blow it back outside. I am 73, 106 pounds with severe arthritis and I can easily maneuver this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great price works well
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 big trees in my front yard. I needed something to move the leaves around. I got a long extension cord and I'm able to get all the leaves of my front walk and into a pile. I find it light and easy to use. I have had no issues. I'm sure there are more powerful models and yes a battery powered unit would be nice, but for the price this thing works great.
customer_reviews.author: zramix

customer_reviews.title: It gets 5 stars for what it is - Not compared to a much more expensive heavier duty model.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good light blower.. It will do just fine for blowing off my deck, porch and other areas I have, It's very compact and light. It almost looks like a toy and sounds more like a hair dryer than a leaf blower. But.... this product doesn't try to represent itself as a high end tool. I think this will work out fine for what I need it for. It's light and easy to maneuver and use. I'll be using it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Motor burned out on the first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this leaf blower because the price seemed great, it came with all the required pieces etc however during the first 5 minutes of use the motor burned out and stopped working all together. I used a new 16 gauge outdoor extension cord (as it requires). Very disappointed, I would avoid buying this and spend the extra money on a name brand one instead
customer_reviews.author: William T.

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight blower!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large, heavy older blower but wanted something to spruce up my deck before company in the summer. Sweeping before guests arrived just got me all sweaty and I thought I'd try this little blower. It's super light and does the trick getting pine needles and what not off the deck in a jif! Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: vjp

customer_reviews.title: this little gadget does the job and some!
customer_reviews.text: True confessions: I’m fighting with gardener but he doesn’t know it. Apartment living is brutal especially when the landscapers aren’t as mindful as you hope they would be. But instead of being THAT tenant at the complex, we picked up this nifty thing. There are two modes: hella high powered then off. So be prepared. Does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie's mom

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to keep as a back up to the gas tools for simple back porch blowing. This thing has truly blown me away. Build quality and ease of use make this worth every penny. Breaks down into a very small bundle for storage. I've not used my gas blower since I purchased. So light weight and blows most yard jojs fine. Good work Sun Joe! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Danman0614

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: For the quality, functionality and price, this is a great deal! The power is totally adequate for my driveway that I used to have to sweep it 2-3 time a day. With the new blower, I can do the job for a few minutes instead of 15-20 minutes. It saves time and energy. I would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great for Car Washes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dry my car after washing it. It works great to get the water from dripping and to prevent any water spots. This is a must have tool for car washes. I used ot as an actual leaf blower, and it worked pretty good. Its not super powerful but it is very small and light weight so it will fit anywhere you need to move air
customer_reviews.author: Adam Blough

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Light enough that I could use it three weeks after total hip replacement. Powerful for such a lightweight and inexpensive blower. Takes about two minutes to take it out of my small deck box, plug it in and blow leaves and acorns off my condo patio!
customer_reviews.author: K. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Powerful for the size/cost!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this blower to do something unusual: power an air injection system for compost piles. It's hooked up to a PVC manifold that blows into three 4'x4'x4' piles of horse and stall waste, on a timer. That's a lot to ask of a little blower, and it's performing like a champ! Now, if only I'd bought a better quality timer; the darn thing resets about twice a month and needs to be reprogrammed. But the blower is excellent, and not too loud.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Kagen

customer_reviews.title: Works well, read description carefully.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little leaf blower, but it is MUCH smaller than I expected. It arrived in a small box and you assemble the pieces. Nice for an apartment or home without a lot of storage. You need to purchase an outdoor extension cord to use the leaf blower as the attached cord is only a foot long.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Currier

customer_reviews.title: Very effective, compact, fun to use
customer_reviews.text: I have a 600 sq foot backyard with grass that we cut with a manual mower. We use the blower to drive cut grass into a corner so we can bag it. Our lawn looks so much better! We also use the blower to get leaves off of our concrete patio. It turns a several hour sweep into a 15 minute leaf blow session. It gets most things but not sticky things that fall off deep into the cracks of our sidewalk. It can also be hard to blow everything into one corner.
customer_reviews.author: Nick P

customer_reviews.title: this baby blows
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this purchase. Amazing price. And this blower has power, it's lightweight, easily assembled and disassembled, and does everything I need. I use it mostly for our patio, where our tree dumps its load. I've only had it about 6 weeks, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: gr8tfuldad2003

customer_reviews.title: Loved the blower light/powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Been using it now for about 2 months and absolutely love it. I use it to clean garage and back patio. Does the job fast and it’s super light weight. Great price and great power for what I need it. Will buy again! Only one thing I noticed is that the extension slips off so just press the prongs together a little bit for a tougher grip and that’s it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but Powerful - Works well
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Works great for cleaning smooth surfaces - garage/driveway/etc. Very light & easy to use. Might want more if trying to clear a large yard but seems like a good value.
customer_reviews.author: john l pellet

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is a great leaf blower for the money. I wasn't expecting a lot because of the low price. However, I was pleasantly surprised at the power this thing has. It's a great leaf blower for the money. Very powerful. It can blow off my patio steps everything and no time flat. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small property
customer_reviews.text: We were super surprised and impressed by how powerful this little, affordable blower is! Already it's saved hours of sweeping and cleaning the pavement with a hose. It's small and uses a power cord, so definitely better on a smaller property but it's perfect for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, good power does the job.
customer_reviews.text: The second one I've bought I have a small porch but sweeping with a broom hurts my back this does a great job and is quite powerful. My neighbor who is also elderly had me order her one online and she loves hers also. Great price compared to hardware stores. You can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: OctaviaWayne designs

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted to get a leaf blower but the cordless ones was too much. Even the chorded ones where. Found this one for cheap and got it instantly. It blows a decent amount of air for a small blower and the build quality is acceptable. Use it weekly on my lawn jobs.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Good
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these to use at our local gun club. We have one in each trap house and use them to blow the dust off the trap machines and out the door. They are surprising good quality, very powerful and functional. We are completely satisfied with them.
customer_reviews.author: Skypilot 18

customer_reviews.title: Small and cheap but mighty
customer_reviews.text: For $16 you never know if you'll get something that's garbage but I decided to trust the reviews. This little thing works great! It's lightweight and got [wet] leaves off my patio within minutes. Hopefully it does as well with snow and fallen tree blooms. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty!
customer_reviews.text: This little blower is exactly what I was looking for. All I need it for is to blow off my driveway and sidewalk every day or two, and for the occasional leaves. It’s perfect. Small and lightweight but packs some power. Perfect for what I’m using it for.
customer_reviews.author: Tony E

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not a time saver, but definitely an energy saver
customer_reviews.text: Its super fast at sweeping out the garage. when it comes to leaves, it has enough power for my small yard, but it took 30 mins to do. I think it would be the same with raking by hand. But it was a little windy out when i was doing it, maybe my work 2x as long.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Lind

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy duty yard work
customer_reviews.text: Nozzle is flimsy and may fall off during your yard work.
customer_reviews.author: P. L. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Really Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant at first by honestly I was very surprised by the power of this little guy. It's small enough to carry it around by a kid but powerful enough to do the job. I have small back and from yard and I could not be more satisfied with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. I use this for everything from blowing leaves/grass and rocks to keeping my fire going. I work a lot in the yard and have even cooled myself off a time or 2 with it. It is so handy. I thought the cord would be cumbersome but not at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best $18 I've ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: This electric leaf blower is powerful and works amazingly! And it was a steal for the price. I couldn't be happier with this product. It's minimized my time raking/sweeping the front and back yards when we do yardwork. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crazycane818

customer_reviews.title: Good speed. Good Value. Just takes time.
customer_reviews.text: I use this exclusively to dry off a car to avoid scratches from toweling dry. It works but does take a while. With the narrow stream of air, it is better suited for moving around leaves and dust. The 155 mph is great, but the amount of air it moves is small. Regardless, I’ve had it for almost two years and it is still working (but I can hear the motor making some noises now). For how much I have used it and the abuse I put it through, it’s a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Hussain Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Not the most powerful but the 6 amp blower does the job for my purposes, it has enough power to push the grass cuttings from the sidewalk easily. The price was outstanding compare to others with the same specs, it was almost 30% less than others.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and strong
customer_reviews.text: This is much better than the broom I used to use! Why did I wait for so long to get it? You will need an extension cord to use this though as the plug is short and specially constructed that you cannot plug it directly into a wall outlet.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: What I Ordered
customer_reviews.text: If you get what you ordered, it looks like what you ordered, didn't take long to get, works well & at a fair price, you are way ahead now days. If you want a leaf blower without spending a ton of money for the same thing, then I this is a good buy. I am disabled & can use it with ease.
customer_reviews.author: iceman48

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use around my RV. Works wonderfully (I’ve used it for 2 1/2 months). I could have payed a lot more for one but I don’t see how a more expensive one could do better than this. Puts out a lot of air to move even wet leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Bob-

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Our leaf blower fell and broke into pieces and we replaced it with this one. Actually, this is our second purchase. It is very lightweight, easy to manage and works well power wise. It's better than our old one.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can’t go wrong. It’ll do a lot of the little jobs like blowing off the patio. It won’t move a massive pile of leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Dixon

customer_reviews.title: What a great machine
customer_reviews.text: This blower is such a great buy. I live in an apartment with two balconies. With pine needles and residue from flower pots falling on the balconies, this blower shoots them out in seconds. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Doolittle

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to use, surprisingly strong airflow. Perfect for my needs. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Garyyds

customer_reviews.title: Works well for low impact blowing
customer_reviews.text: Not powerful but great for mini jobs. We’re in Vegas and don’t have many trees. If we had I would have purchased a gas powered one. This one is a joke but works well. Make sure you buy Woods 982452 50-Foot SJTOW with it or you’ll burn alive.
customer_reviews.author: Gianni Choco

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight with a lot of power
customer_reviews.text: Great patio blower for the price. I chose this blower because of the great reviews and cheap price. The only reason you may want to upgrade is because it isn't cordless. However, that isnt an issue for me because my cord reaches everywhere I need to use it. I didnt want to pay more money or deal with recharging/running out of batteries. I was surprised how much power this lightweight blower has! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Laws

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME!
customer_reviews.text: I weep for this nation when I see customers bad reviews because it didn't come with an extension cord. Those people are basically retarded. Great product at a great price. The "extension cord" cost more than the blower itself
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight blower.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for drying my vehicles rather then using towels. It is small and light with lots of power. Able to dry entire car and wheels without leaving streaks or scratches from abrasive towels.
customer_reviews.author: Catbb1

customer_reviews.title: Blows you away
customer_reviews.text: Such power!!! I love electric tools, and this guy did better than I was expecting. The nose was about 6 inches longer than my last electric blower, so easier on your back. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Iacobelli

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfect No Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Great blower for the price. I use this every single week blowing off a slightly large driveway in Florida. Does a great job for the price and would buy again. Have had for about 10 months use it almost weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Berger

customer_reviews.title: Sun Joe SBJ597E-GRY 6-Amp 155 MPH Electric Leaf Blower, Grey
customer_reviews.text: This thing does exactly what I needed it to do -perfect size for blowing off my back porch and my porch. Very powerful for it''s size. t this price range, definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: RDD

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well, cheap on price and great as a blower
customer_reviews.text: This is a second one I bought for the family. For the price, you can't beat it. We use it to clean the deck, patio, garage. Also, to clean the vacuum cleaners - Dysons. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: S. Dhruva

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive blower does good job cleaning cut grass from my sidewalk. Let's see how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Great value and decent power
customer_reviews.text: Let’s break it down quick. Not the most powerful machine but it gets the job done. Just needed something simple for grass and leaves... this does the trick . Not fancy, not super powerful, but gets what i need done. It’s very light too. I would buy again if needed. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Martini81

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little leaf blower!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, powerful, well-priced leaf blower. We bought it to use on our camper to blow the leaves off the awning and slide. We were impressed with how strong it is. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: loveatlast

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely happy with this purchase. The price almost makes it to good to be true. It’s lightweight but powerful. I’m a single homeowner and this blower makes it extremely easy to keep up with the enormous amount of leaves and pollen that fall on my deck.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Damiano

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. And very inexpensive. Works like something that cost a lot more. Light weight which is important for me after my back surgery. I just cleaned out my flowerbeds and down my whole driveway finishing off with my front porch and I am amazed. Great value. Great product
customer_reviews.author: CorrieG

customer_reviews.title: Easy, inexpensive, should have done it before!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to blow away leaves, and pine needles from our deck. One of the smartest buys ever!
customer_reviews.author: Booksandcoffee

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: It is only 3.9 lbs, very easy to use, and very low price too. I also bought a 100 feet extension cords, it is enough to reach my back yard and front yard. I would Never worry about that if there is not enough battery. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power in a small package
customer_reviews.text: This thing is unbelievably powerful for it's size. I had a battery powered one, but I hate having to charge them. This blower does the trick. The only thing I wish is that the nozzle was a bit longer. I'm 6'2" and have to hunch over a bit, so that's a bit annoying. Other than that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for the back yard patio area so I don’t have to sweep and it works great
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that this is compact so it doesn’t take up a lot of room. I do wish it had a long cord, but not a deal breaker, you just need a long extension cord to get around.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia W.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: For the small price you get a big blow... :-0 it really works well... just need to to clean my garage out and a quick blow of the patio and Blam! Recommended thanks JT Rock'n Rossi
customer_reviews.author: JT Rock'n Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Blower
customer_reviews.text: It’s powerful but lightweight. My only pet peeve is the hose part comes off when it’s turned on.
customer_reviews.author: Unttextbooks

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t been able to use as yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this as I need to buy the right extension cord... it comes with a very short plug and thus I could not try it as yet. I wish the distributor made this known before I purchased!!
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Great little blower that packs a punch for a low price
customer_reviews.text: Just received the blower and for the price it exceeds expectations. It is loud, but have you heard wind blowing 155mph its kindof loud. So if you want the power its gonna make some noise. It is very light and easy to handle for how powerful it is. We got it to blow off a large concrete patio. It was able to blow leaves, tree stuff that falls and rocks, so it works great for our need.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: It's small. But for 20 it works fine. The cord gets a little annoying. But there is a cord hook so that helps. Iv had no issues. I use it for my shop floor and out the drive way.
customer_reviews.author: FatKatMOTO

customer_reviews.title: Leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: Great product for such a cheap price. I use it for leaves under the carport and driveway and works perfectly. Its not super strong so I wouldn't recommend for anything heavier than a pile of leaf. If I had to get another I would buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Katy B

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I use it to blow leaves off of the deck outside of my condo. It works like a charm. Just remember to get an extension cord. The cord is short and will not work well enough on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Great and very easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean our condo balcony. It is very useful, gets rid of leaves, birdseed spilled from a feeder, and anything else on the balcony floor in about 1 to 2 minutes! Our balcony isn't big and I am not that strong and this is perfect! I can use it easily and the balcony looks great very quickly yet it doesn't blow too hard. ( I am careful to aim it at the floor so it doesn't disturb our plants.)
customer_reviews.author: Margaret B.

customer_reviews.title: Small but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Small but powerful! Compared to my neighbor's beast, I feel this is very powerful and does what it's supposed to, blowing leaves away. More importantly, because if the lighter light weight design, you can use it easily for a prolonged time.
customer_reviews.author: Takis A.

customer_reviews.title: Wow, strong blower
customer_reviews.text: I am happy to buy this machine, you can beat the price , not that noisy, a hurricane category 3 or 4 to clean and dry my patio , my terrace and my grass...and to scare my cat
customer_reviews.author: FDS

customer_reviews.title: Great blower
customer_reviews.text: Can not be beat for the price. Using to clean up our deck. Normally I would have to go to the shed get out the 200 mph Toro gas blower make sure it has gas, get it started etc. You know the drill. This blower is light weight and powerful enough to do the job. And a bonus guys , my wife doesn’t have a problem using it. Fits nicely in my deck box without taking it apart. Can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It's as small as a toy and works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: It's as small as a toy and works like a champ. Pretty awesome to me that it can almost fold away compared to my old craftsman blower. Works just as good and acceptable sound level for 30 min of use cleaning the clippings
customer_reviews.author: Jack P.

customer_reviews.title: Great little leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used it once to clear a rooftop deck and I am amazed at how well it worked for the price. I live in an apartment and the small compact size- especially when the nose is removed - is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Small and mighty, does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I use this at my campsite. It has plenty of power and clears off large wet leaves, grass clippings, and small branches, too. You can’t beat the price. And it is small enough to stow under the rv. I also use it for my slide outs.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Arbor

customer_reviews.title: Works great , inexpensive and pretty light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised on the sturdiness of it and it has some weight. I have painful wrist that is the main reasons I made this purchase. Can't beat the price .
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Opened box. Took 4 seconds to assemble. Was done blowing away all of my leaves around house and driveway in 4-5 minutes. This little thing has some power! Super light weight. Stores very well. If things change I’ll write an update...but these are some of the best 16$ (Prime day) I have spent in a while!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my RV. Nice and light and strong enough to blow the leaves away and clean up the area under my awning. Like it so much I bought a 2nd unit for my back yard at home. Easier than using my large, gas powered blower when the patio needs a quick cleaning. I just keep it in the patio deck box with my seat cushions with an extension cord. Fast and easy cleanup. Love this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sun Joe SBJ597E-GRY 6-Amp 155 MPH Electric Leaf Blower, One Size, Grey
product_meta.description: Color:GreyThe light choice is the right choice! When a big blower is simply too much for the job, this diminutive dynamo's 6-amp motor Pack a powerful 155 mph punch. It's just the Right size for light-duty household applications like sweeping porches, patios, walkways, decks & garages - & even light snow! You'll want to take it everywhere, & when you're done, it's small enough to stow away quickly & easily in the car trunk, deck box or broom closet. Bigger isn't always better - when sometimes all you need is small!
feature_bullets: VERSATILE: Clean sweeping patios, driveways, decks and garages
POWERFUL: 6-amp motor creates up to 155 mph air speed (max)

WE'VE GOT YOU COVERED!: Your new leaf blower is backed by the Snow Joe + Sun Joe customer promise. We will warrant new, powered products for two years from the date of purchase. No questions asked. Contact Snow Joe + Sun Joe customer support at 1-866-766-9563 for further assistance.
